name: wl-equsalcom
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

stmt.origin: albii(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0))

comment: This simple equivalence eases substitution of one expression for the other. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 1-Sep-2018.)
